cnd21:4.1: Idamavoca bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye, paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṃ byākāsi.
cnd21:5.6: Magadhesu viharantoti magadhanāmake janapade viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpento.
cnd21:5.9: Paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānanti piṅgiyo brāhmaṇo bāvarissa brāhmaṇassa paddho paddhacaro paricārako sisso.
cnd21:5.12: Atha vā te soḷasa brāhmaṇā buddhassa bhagavato paddhā paddhacarā paricārakā sissāti—
cnd21:6.3: Puṭṭho puṭṭhoti puṭṭho puṭṭho pucchito pucchito yācito yācito ajjhesito ajjhesito pasādito pasādito.
cnd21:6.4: Pañhaṃ byākāsīti pañhaṃ byākāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīākāsi pakāsesīti—
cnd21:7.1: “Idamavoca bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye, paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṃ byākāsī”ti.
cnd21:8.1: Ekamekassa cepi pañhassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ.
cnd21:9.1: Ekamekassa cepi pañhassāti ekamekassa cepi ajitapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi tissametteyyapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi puṇṇakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi mettagūpañhassa, ekamekassa cepi dhotakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi upasīvapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi nandakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi hemakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi todeyyapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi kappapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi jatukaṇṇipañhassa, ekamekassa cepi bhadrāvudhapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi udayapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi posālapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi mogharājapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi piṅgiyapañhassāti—
cnd21:10.1: Atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyāti sveva pañho dhammo, visajjanaṃ atthoti atthaṃ aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti—
cnd21:10.3: Dhammamaññāyāti dhammaṃ aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti—
cnd21:10.6: Dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyyāti sammāpaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anvatthapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjeyyāti—
cnd21:10.8: Gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāranti jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ.
cnd21:10.9: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
cnd21:10.10: Gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāranti jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ adhiphasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti—
cnd21:10.12: Pāraṅgamanīyā ime dhammāti ime dhammā pāraṅgamanīyā.
cnd21:10.13: Pāraṃ pāpenti pāraṃ sampāpenti pāraṃ samanupāpenti, jarāmaraṇassa taraṇāya saṃvattantīti—
cnd21:11.2: Tasmāti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānāti—
cnd21:11.6: Pārāyananteva adhivacananti pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ … pe … nirodho nibbānaṃ.
cnd21:11.13: Adhivacananti saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpoti—
cnd21:12.1: “Ekamekassa cepi pañhassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ.
cnd21:16.3: Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ.
cnd21:16.5: Bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho, sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, abhiññeyyatāya buddho, visavitāya buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddho, abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhāti buddho.
cnd21:16.6: Buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ na pitarā kataṃ na bhātarā kataṃ na bhaginiyā kataṃ na mittāmaccehi kataṃ na ñātisālohitehi kataṃ na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ na devatāhi kataṃ.
cnd21:16.7: Vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutañāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti.
cnd21:16.8: Ete buddhaṃ upāgacchunti ete buddhaṃ upāgamiṃsu upasaṅkamiṃsu payirupāsiṃsu paripucchiṃsu paripañhiṃsūti—
cnd21:17.2: Sīlasaṃvaropi caraṇaṃ, indriyasaṃvaropi caraṇaṃ, bhojane mattaññutāpi caraṇaṃ, jāgariyānuyogopi caraṇaṃ, sattapi saddhammā caraṇaṃ, cattāripi jhānāni caraṇaṃ.
cnd21:17.3: Sampannacaraṇanti sampannacaraṇaṃ seṭṭhacaraṇaṃ viseṭṭhacaraṇaṃ pāmokkhacaraṇaṃ uttamacaraṇaṃ pavaracaraṇaṃ.
cnd21:17.4: Isīti isi bhagavā mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti isi … pe …
cnd21:17.6: mahesakkhehi vā sattehi esito gavesito pariyesito—
cnd21:17.7: “kahaṃ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo kahaṃ narāsabho”ti—
cnd21:18.3: Nipuṇe pañheti gambhīre duddase duranubodhe sante paṇīte atakkāvacare nipuṇe paṇḍitavedanīye pañheti—
cnd21:19.5: Seṭṭhanti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ buddhaṃ upāgamuṃ upāgamiṃsu upasaṅkamiṃsu payirupāsiṃsu paripucchiṃsu paripañhiṃsūti—
cnd21:22.6: Pabyākāsīti tesaṃ buddho pabyākāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesīti—
cnd21:23.2: Pañhaṃ puṭṭhoti pañhaṃ puṭṭho pucchito yācito ajjhesito pasādito.
cnd21:23.3: Yathātathanti yathā ācikkhitabbaṃ tathā ācikkhi, yathā desitabbaṃ tathā desesi, yathā paññapetabbaṃ tathā paññapesi, yathā paṭṭhapetabbaṃ tathā paṭṭhapesi, yathā vivaritabbaṃ tathā vivari, yathā vibhajitabbaṃ tathā vibhaji, yathā uttānīkātabbaṃ tathā uttānīakāsi, yathā pakāsitabbaṃ tathā pakāsesīti—
cnd21:24.1: Pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇenāti pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena ācikkhanena desanena paññapanena paṭṭhapanena vivaraṇena vibhajanena uttānīkammena pakāsanenāti—
cnd21:25.2: Tosesīti tosesi vitosesi pasādesi ārādhesi attamane akāsi.
cnd21:28.3: Tositāti tositā vitositā pasāditā ārādhitā attamanā katāti—
cnd21:28.6: maṃsacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, dibbacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, paññācakkhunāpi cakkhumā, buddhacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, samantacakkhunāpi cakkhumā.
cnd21:29.6: So gotamo gottena, bhagavāpi gotamo gottena, bhagavā sūriyassa gottañātako gottabandhu.
cnd21:30.1: Brahmacariyamacariṃsūti brahmacariyaṃ vuccati asaddhammasamāpattiyā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī viramaṇaṃ akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto.
cnd21:30.2: Api ca nippariyāyavasena brahmacariyaṃ vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ—
cnd21:30.3: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
cnd21:30.4: Brahmacariyamacariṃsūti brahmacariyaṃ cariṃsu acariṃsu samādāya vattiṃsūti—
cnd21:31.1: Varapaññassa santiketi varapaññassa aggapaññassa seṭṭhapaññassa viseṭṭhapaññassa pāmokkhapaññassa uttamapaññassa pavarapaññassa.
cnd21:31.2: Santiketi santike sāmantā āsanne avidūre upakaṭṭheti—
cnd21:34.1: Ekamekassa pañhassāti ekamekassa ajitapañhassa, ekamekassa tissametteyyapañhassa … pe …
cnd21:35.2: Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū … pe …
cnd21:35.5: Yathā buddhena desitanti yathā buddhena ācikkhitaṃ desitaṃ paññapitaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ vivaritaṃ vibhajitaṃ uttānīkataṃ pakāsitanti—
cnd21:36.1: Tathā yo paṭipajjeyyāti sammāpaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anvatthapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjeyyāti—
cnd21:37.1: Gacche pāraṃ apāratoti pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ … pe … nirodho nibbānaṃ;
cnd21:37.4: apāraṃ vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca.
cnd21:37.5: Gacche pāraṃ apāratoti apārato pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ phasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti—
cnd21:40.1: Apārā pāraṃ gaccheyyāti apāraṃ vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca;
cnd21:40.2: pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ … pe … taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
cnd21:40.5: Apārā pāraṃ gaccheyyāti apārā pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ phasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti—
cnd21:41.1: Bhāvento maggamuttamanti maggamuttamaṃ vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ—
cnd21:41.5: Maggamuttamanti maggaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ.
cnd21:44.1: Pāraṃ gamanāyāti pāraṃ gamanāya pāraṃ sampāpanāya pāraṃ samanupāpanāya jarāmaraṇassa taraṇāyāti—
cnd21:45.2: Tasmāti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā.
